main event: A bright light was observed hovering in the air before moving off at high speed and disappearing over a mountain in Stockton, California in 1954.
interesting points: The object was described as a bright, silvery, hazy glow with no detailed features, and it hovered in the air with no trail or glow.
The object was observed for 25 seconds to 1 minute, and it disappeared after moving up and down with a great burst of speed in a straight line.
The sighting was reported by a reliable witness, a 35-year-old housewife, as well as a Major who was an Aircraft Maintenance Officer.
F-86 aircraft were observed flying in the local area and the object was presumed to be from George Air Force Base.
The report includes a blurry photograph depicting an aerial object or phenomenon observed in the local area.
sighted object: bright light hovering in the air
photographs: yes, the report includes a blurry photograph
